readable.title: 3068945309_ff0973e859
readable.content: A basketball player in a white uniform is making a jump shot against a team wearing black uniforms . A basketball player takes a shot . A man wearing a white uniform is trying to make a shot but the two men in black are trying to block him . Basketball players leap for the ball while the crowd watches . Basketball player in white uniform leaping to make a shot while being blocked by player in black .
